Under Construction Page

CSS/Javascript Animation

Your under construction page is a little less embarassing with this guy.

I originally created this using Adobe Edge Animate, but I was unsatisfied with the performance. I converted it to a simple gif that sits inside the iMac shell.

By using a simple gif, I increased the performace of the animation and removed the needs for any javascript.
